resources.string: Next bus to the Play store arriving shortly…
Install the wompwomp app for your funniest minute everyday: http://wompwomp.co/install
If you like our app share it with others
We want your feedback. Rate us on the Play store
Made with love in the USA
To share pictures to other apps wompwomp needs permission to write pictures to your device.

string-array.name: loading_messages
string-array.item: Bringing you funny content from Antarctica in a bit
Loading best content from the Voyager mission
Today\'s content is sponsored by emperor penguins
Loading lost content from Atlantis in a bit
Carrier pigeons bringing content to you shortly
Delivery vehicle is reentering the earth\'s atmosphere
Waiting for popping to stop before opening the microwave
Just a few moments before we take stuff out of the oven
Waiting on kittens to approve today\'s content
